name: Pivot
headline: Your AI FP&A Analyst
description: Pivot helps you visualise, analyse and model your company's financial data way faster than Excel.
tags: industry:saas; industry:finance; industry:b2b; industry:productivity; industry:enterprise-software; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Raimie Tang, Founder
founders.description:
Building Pivot, your AI FP&A Analyst. 

Prior to Pivot, we built and exited dateideas, after scaling it to $1M+ GMV in under 15 months. It was profitable from Day 1. During exit, dateideas had a community of 70,000+ couples and was reaching 500,000+ people every month. The company continues to run and is still growing today.

Was fortunate to study in NUS & Stanford University. Beyond startup life, family means the world to me.

generated_description:
### Company Summary: Pivot

**Name:** Pivot  
**Founded:** 2024  
**Location:** San Francisco  
**Team Size:** 2  
**Batch:** Y Combinator Batch S22  
**Website:** [trypivot.xyz](https://www.trypivot.xyz/)  

**Mission:** To serve as your AI FP&A analyst, making it straightforward and efficient to visualize, analyze, and model your financial data significantly faster than traditional tools like Excel.

#### Background
Pivot emerged from the need for streamlined financial analysis in a world that demands quick, accurate decision-making. The company aims to empower businesses with an AI-driven platform that minimizes the complexities involved in financial planning and analysis.

#### Offerings
While detailed insights into what Pivot currently offers are not accessible (the website seems to have encountered a temporary DNS error), the foundation lies in transforming financial data into actionable insights, reducing the cumbersome processes of manual entry and analysis.

#### Classification and Tags
Pivot can be categorized under several tags including:
- SaaS
- Finance
- B2B
- Productivity
- Enterprise Software
- San Francisco Bay Area

With a highly focused team and backing from Y Combinator, Pivot represents a promising venture aiming to disrupt the financial software space and make sophisticated financial analysis accessible to enterprises of all sizes.

In short, if you’re looking for innovation in financial analytics powered by AI, Pivot might just be your new go-to tool. Keep an eye on them as they grow!
